Deprecated API

  • Deprecated Classes

  • Deprecated Interfaces 
    Interface and Description
    org.spongepowered.api.data.manipulator.mutable.tileentity.BedData
    Use DyeableData instead
    org.spongepowered.api.world.schematic.BlockPalette
    Use Palette for improved generics
    org.spongepowered.api.world.schematic.BlockPaletteType
    Use PaletteType for better generics
    org.spongepowered.api.event.entity.BreedEntityEvent
    org.spongepowered.api.event.entity.living.humanoid.ChangeLevelEvent
    Use ChangeEntityExperienceEvent instead
    org.spongepowered.api.data.manipulator.immutable.tileentity.ImmutableBedData
    Use ImmutableDyeableData instead
    org.spongepowered.api.event.entity.SpawnEntityEvent.Spawner
    Utilize SpawnTypes.MOB_SPAWNER as context.
  • Deprecated Classes 
    Class and Description
    org.spongepowered.api.data.manipulator.mutable.common.AbstractIntData
    Useless without its immutable counterpart, use AbstractSingleData instead.
    org.spongepowered.api.world.schematic.BlockPaletteTypes
    Use PaletteTypes.
    org.spongepowered.api.data.property.DisplacementProperty
    As of API 7, intended for removal in API 8, with no alternative due to accidental existence in the API
    org.spongepowered.api.util.GuavaCollectors
    Use methods provided by Guava
    org.spongepowered.api.data.key.KeyFactory
    To be removed in future API versions. Use Key.builder() to create keys.
    org.spongepowered.api.data.MemoryDataContainer
    To be removed in future releases to avoid implementation bugs being part of the API.
    org.spongepowered.api.data.MemoryDataView
    To be moved to implementation to avoid implementation bugs being existing in the API.
    org.spongepowered.api.extra.modifier.skylands.SkylandsBiomeGenerator
    Will be removed from the api
    org.spongepowered.api.extra.modifier.skylands.SkylandsGrassPopulator
    Will be removed from the api
    org.spongepowered.api.extra.modifier.skylands.SkylandsGroundCoverPopulator
    Will be removed from the api
    org.spongepowered.api.extra.modifier.skylands.SkylandsTerrainGenerator
    Will be removed from the api
    org.spongepowered.api.extra.modifier.skylands.SkylandsWorldGeneratorModifier
    Will be removed from the api
  • Deprecated Fields 
    Field and Description
    org.spongepowered.api.CatalogTypes.ENCHANTMENT
    Use CatalogTypes.ENCHANTMENT_TYPE instead
    org.spongepowered.api.world.schematic.BlockPaletteTypes.GLOBAL
    See PaletteTypes.GLOBAL_BLOCKS
    org.spongepowered.api.data.key.Keys.JOHNNY_VINDICATOR
    In favor of Keys.IS_JOHNNY to match with the rest of API and in-case other mobs ever support "johnny" mode in any implementation. Will be removed in API 8
    org.spongepowered.api.util.TypeTokens.LAST_ATTACKER_TOKEN
    org.spongepowered.api.util.TypeTokens.LAST_ATTACKER_VALUE_TOKEN
    org.spongepowered.api.text.serializer.TextSerializers.LEGACY_FORMATTING_CODE
    Legacy formatting codes are being phased out of Minecraft
    org.spongepowered.api.world.schematic.BlockPaletteTypes.LOCAL
    See PaletteTypes.LOCAL_BLOCKS
    org.spongepowered.api.world.gen.WorldGeneratorModifiers.SKYLANDS
    Will be removed from the api
    org.spongepowered.api.event.cause.entity.damage.DamageModifierTypes.SWEAPING
    use DamageModifierTypes.SWEEPING
    org.spongepowered.api.world.WorldArchetypes.THE_SKYLANDS
    Will be removed from the api
    org.spongepowered.api.event.cause.EventContextKeys.THROWER
    this key is a duplicate of EventContextKeys.PROJECTILE_SOURCE and will be removed in API 8. See this issue on SpongeAPI, Use EventContextKeys.PROJECTILE_SOURCE instead.
    org.spongepowered.api.event.entity.TameEntityEvent.USED_ITEM
    Use EventContextKeys.USED_ITEM
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    org.spongepowered.api.profile.GameProfileCache.add(GameProfile, boolean, Date)
    Use GameProfileCache.add(GameProfile, boolean, Instant)
    org.spongepowered.api.profile.GameProfileCache.add(GameProfile, Date)
    Use GameProfileCache.add(GameProfile, Instant)
    org.spongepowered.api.util.metric.MetricsConfigManager.areMetricsEnabled(Object)
    org.spongepowered.api.util.metric.MetricsConfigManager.areMetricsEnabled(PluginContainer)
    org.spongepowered.api.item.recipe.crafting.ShapelessCraftingRecipe.Builder.EndStep.build(String, Object)
    Use CatalogBuilder.build() instead in combination with ShapelessCraftingRecipe.Builder.EndStep.id(String)
    org.spongepowered.api.item.recipe.crafting.ShapedCraftingRecipe.Builder.EndStep.build(String, Object)
    Use CatalogBuilder.build() instead in combination with ShapedCraftingRecipe.Builder.EndStep.id(String)
    org.spongepowered.api.data.DataRegistration.Builder.buildAndRegister(PluginContainer)
    Use DataRegistration.Builder.build() instead
    org.spongepowered.api.event.entity.ChangeEntityExperienceEvent.createChangeEntityExperienceEvent(Cause, int, int, Entity)
    org.spongepowered.api.event.entity.MoveEntityEvent.Teleport.createMoveEntityEventTeleport(Cause, Transform<World>, Transform<World>, Entity)
    org.spongepowered.api.event.entity.MoveEntityEvent.Teleport.Portal.createMoveEntityEventTeleportPortal(Cause, Transform<World>, Transform<World>, PortalAgent, Entity, boolean)
    org.spongepowered.api.data.DataRegistration.Builder.dataName(String)
    Use CatalogBuilder.name(String) instead
    org.spongepowered.api.data.manipulator.immutable.common.AbstractImmutableSingleEnumData.enumType()
    Use AbstractImmutableSingleEnumData.getValueGetter() instead.
    org.spongepowered.api.advancement.Advancement.Builder.from(Advancement)
    org.spongepowered.api.advancement.AdvancementTree.Builder.from(AdvancementTree)
    org.spongepowered.api.util.CatalogBuilder.from(C)
    It's not allowed to duplicate catalog types.
    org.spongepowered.api.data.DataRegistration.Builder.from(DataRegistration<T, I>)
    org.spongepowered.api.data.key.Key.Builder.from(Key<V>)
    org.spongepowered.api.advancement.criteria.trigger.Trigger.Builder.from(Trigger<C>)
    org.spongepowered.api.Platform.getApi()
    Use Platform.getContainer(Component) with Platform.Component.API
    org.spongepowered.api.block.tileentity.Bed.getBedData()
    Use Bed.getDyeableData() instead
    org.spongepowered.api.item.inventory.ItemStackSnapshot.getCount()
    Use ItemStackSnapshot.getQuantity()
    org.spongepowered.api.event.entity.RideEntityEvent.Dismount.getDismountType()
    Use EventContextKeys.DISMOUNT_TYPE instead
    org.spongepowered.api.event.entity.ChangeEntityExperienceEvent.getExperience()
    Use ChangeEntityExperienceEvent.getFinalData() instead, which provides more information about the experience.
    org.spongepowered.api.Platform.getImplementation()
    Use Platform.getContainer(Component) with Platform.Component.IMPLEMENTATION
    org.spongepowered.api.world.Chunk.getInhabittedTime()
    Due to misspelling, use Chunk.getInhabitedTime() instead
    org.spongepowered.api.item.inventory.ItemStack.getItem()
    Use ItemStack.getType()
    org.spongepowered.api.event.entity.ChangeEntityEquipmentEvent.getItemStack()
    Use ChangeEntityEquipmentEvent.getTransaction() instead
    org.spongepowered.api.event.impl.AbstractChangeEntityEquipmentEvent.getItemStack()
    org.spongepowered.api.event.action.FishingEvent.Stop.getItemStackTransaction()
    Use FishingEvent.Stop.getTransactions()
    org.spongepowered.api.service.context.Context.getName()
    This method name is misleading - contexts only have a "key" and "value". It is not immediately clear what "name" relates to. (it could reasonably be either key or value)
    org.spongepowered.api.event.entity.ChangeEntityExperienceEvent.getOriginalExperience()
    Use ChangeEntityExperienceEvent.getOriginalData() instead, which provides more information about the experience.
    org.spongepowered.api.event.entity.ChangeEntityEquipmentEvent.getOriginalItemStack()
    Use ChangeEntityEquipmentEvent.getTransaction() instead
    org.spongepowered.api.event.impl.AbstractChangeEntityEquipmentEvent.getOriginalItemStack()
    org.spongepowered.api.world.schematic.Schematic.getPalette()
    org.spongepowered.api.item.recipe.RecipeRegistry.getRecipes()
    Use CatalogRegistryModule.getAll() instead.
    org.spongepowered.api.GameRegistry.getSelectorFactory()
    Use the appropriate class in the selector package instead
    org.spongepowered.api.event.block.tileentity.SmeltEvent.Interrupt.getSmeltedItems()
    always empty
    org.spongepowered.api.item.inventory.Slot.getStackSize()
    Use Inventory.totalItems() instead.
    org.spongepowered.api.command.args.CommandArgs.getState()
    Use CommandArgs.getSnapshot() and CommandArgs.applySnapshot(Snapshot) instead
    org.spongepowered.api.GameRegistry.getTextSerializerFactory()
    Use TextSerializers instead
    org.spongepowered.api.service.context.Context.getType()
    The presence of this method is misleading - the context "type" is the same value as the "key". They are not separate attributes, as the presence of two distinct methods would otherwise suggest.
    org.spongepowered.api.util.Functional.guavaToJava8(Predicate<E>)
    Predicate extends Predicate
    org.spongepowered.api.data.DataTransactionResult.ifSucessful(Consumer<List<ImmutableValue<?>>>)
    Use DataTransactionResult.ifSuccessful(Consumer) instead
    org.spongepowered.api.item.inventory.ItemStack.Builder.keyValue(Key<? extends BaseValue<E>>, E)
    As of API 7 due to being a duplicate method. Accomplishes the same thing as ItemStack.Builder.add(Key, Object), so is not needed alongside that, expected for removal in API 8 or 9. Use ItemStack.Builder.add(Key, Object) instead
    org.spongepowered.api.data.key.KeyFactory.makeListKey(TypeToken<? extends List<E>>, TypeToken<ListValue<E>>, DataQuery, String, String)
    Use Key.builder() to build keys. Implementation is being removed in future API versions
    org.spongepowered.api.data.key.KeyFactory.makeMapKey(TypeToken<Map<K, V>>, TypeToken<MapValue<K, V>>, DataQuery, String, String)
    Use Key.builder() to build keys. Implementation is being removed in future API versions
    org.spongepowered.api.data.key.KeyFactory.makeOptionalKey(TypeToken<Optional<E>>, TypeToken<OptionalValue<E>>, DataQuery, String, String)
    Use Key.builder() to build keys. Implementation is being removed in future API versions
    org.spongepowered.api.data.key.KeyFactory.makeSetKey(TypeToken<? extends Set<E>>, TypeToken<SetValue<E>>, DataQuery, String, String)
    Use Key.builder() to build keys. Implementation is being removed in future API versions
    org.spongepowered.api.data.key.KeyFactory.makeSingleKey(TypeToken<E>, TypeToken<V>, DataQuery, String, String)
    Use Key.builder() to build keys. Implementation is being removed in future API versions
    org.spongepowered.api.data.DataRegistration.Builder.manipulatorId(String)
    Use CatalogBuilder.id(String) instead
    org.spongepowered.api.world.schematic.Schematic.Builder.palette(BlockPalette)
    Use Schematic.Builder.blockPalette(Palette)
    org.spongepowered.api.world.schematic.Schematic.Builder.paletteType(BlockPaletteType)
    Use Schematic.Builder.blockPaletteType(PaletteType)
    org.spongepowered.api.item.inventory.Inventory.query(Class<?>...)
    use Inventory.query(QueryOperation...) instead
    org.spongepowered.api.item.inventory.Inventory.query(InventoryProperty<?, ?>...)
    use Inventory.query(QueryOperation...) instead
    org.spongepowered.api.item.inventory.Inventory.query(ItemStack...)
    use Inventory.query(QueryOperation...) instead
    org.spongepowered.api.item.inventory.Inventory.query(ItemType...)
    use Inventory.query(QueryOperation...) instead
    org.spongepowered.api.item.inventory.Inventory.query(Object...)
    use instead
    org.spongepowered.api.item.inventory.Inventory.query(Translation...)
    use instead
    org.spongepowered.api.item.inventory.Inventory.queryAny(ItemStack...)
    use Inventory.query(QueryOperation...) instead
    org.spongepowered.api.GameRegistry.register(Class<T>, T)
    Is scheduled to be removed in API 8, the GameRegistryEvent.Register should be used instead
    org.spongepowered.api.item.recipe.RecipeRegistry.register(T)
    Use the event GameRegistryEvent.Register
    org.spongepowered.api.data.DataManager.registerTranslator(Class<T>, DataTranslator<T>)
    Use the event org.spongepowered.api.event.game.GameRegistryEvent.Register&lt;DataTranslator&lt;?&gt;&gt; instead
    org.spongepowered.api.command.args.CommandArgs.removeArgs(Object, Object)
    Use with CommandArgs.getSnapshot() instead of CommandArgs.getState() with CommandArgs.removeArgs(Snapshot, Snapshot)
    org.spongepowered.api.text.selector.Selector.resolveForce(Collection<? extends Extent>)
    Use Selector.resolve(Collection)
    org.spongepowered.api.text.selector.Selector.resolveForce(CommandSource)
    Use Selector.resolve(CommandSource)
    org.spongepowered.api.text.selector.Selector.resolveForce(Extent...)
    Use Selector.resolve(Extent[])
    org.spongepowered.api.text.selector.Selector.resolveForce(Location<World>)
    Use Selector.resolve(Location)
    org.spongepowered.api.command.args.CommandFlags.Builder.setAcceptsArbitraryLongFlags(boolean)
    in favor of #setUnknownLongFlagBehavior(UnknownFlagBehavior).
    org.spongepowered.api.event.entity.ChangeEntityExperienceEvent.setExperience(int)
    Modify the value returned by ChangeEntityExperienceEvent.getFinalData() instead, which provides more information about the experience.
    org.spongepowered.api.command.args.CommandArgs.setState(Object)
    Use CommandArgs.getSnapshot() and CommandArgs.applySnapshot(Snapshot) instead
    org.spongepowered.api.service.context.Context.setValue(String)
    org.spongepowered.api.util.GuavaCollectors.toImmutableList()
    Use ImmutableList.toImmutableList()
    org.spongepowered.api.util.GuavaCollectors.toImmutableSet()
    Use ImmutableSet.toImmutableSet()
  • Deprecated Constructors 
    Constructor and Description

    org.spongepowered.api.data.manipulator.immutable.common.AbstractImmutableListData(List<E>, Key<? extends BaseValue<List<E>>>)
    Use AbstractImmutableListData.AbstractImmutableListData(Key, List) instead.

    Use AbstractImmutableMappedData.AbstractImmutableMappedData(Key, Map, Map) instead.
    org.spongepowered.api.data.manipulator.immutable.common.AbstractImmutableSingleCatalogData(E, E, Key<? extends BaseValue<E>>)
    Use AbstractImmutableSingleCatalogData.AbstractImmutableSingleCatalogData(Key, CatalogType, CatalogType) instead.
    org.spongepowered.api.data.manipulator.immutable.common.AbstractImmutableSingleData(T, Key<? extends BaseValue<T>>)
    Use AbstractImmutableSingleData.AbstractImmutableSingleData(Key, Object) instead.
    org.spongepowered.api.data.manipulator.immutable.common.AbstractImmutableSingleEnumData(E, E, Key<Value<E>>)
    Use AbstractImmutableSingleEnumData.AbstractImmutableSingleEnumData(Key, Enum, Enum) instead.
    org.spongepowered.api.data.manipulator.mutable.common.AbstractIntData(int, Key<? extends BaseValue<Integer>>)
    org.spongepowered.api.data.manipulator.mutable.common.AbstractListData(List<E>, Key<? extends BaseValue<List<E>>>)
    Use AbstractListData.AbstractListData(Key, List) instead.
    org.spongepowered.api.data.manipulator.mutable.common.AbstractMappedData(Map<K, V>, Key<? extends BaseValue<Map<K, V>>>)
    Use AbstractMappedData.AbstractMappedData(Key, Map) instead.
    org.spongepowered.api.data.manipulator.mutable.common.AbstractSingleCatalogData(T, Key<Value<T>>)
    Use AbstractSingleCatalogData.AbstractSingleCatalogData(Key, CatalogType) instead.
    org.spongepowered.api.data.manipulator.mutable.common.AbstractSingleData(T, Key<? extends BaseValue<T>>)
    Use AbstractSingleData.AbstractSingleData(Key, Object) instead.
    org.spongepowered.api.data.manipulator.mutable.common.AbstractSingleEnumData(E, Key<? extends BaseValue<E>>, E)
    Use AbstractSingleEnumData.AbstractSingleEnumData(Key, Enum, Enum) instead.
    org.spongepowered.api.command.args.ChildCommandElementExecutor(CommandExecutor)
    Use the other constructor instead. Note: this entire system will be replaced in API 8.
    org.spongepowered.api.item.inventory.InventoryArchetypes()
    Will be made private in API 8
    org.spongepowered.api.data.MemoryDataContainer()
    Use DataContainer.createNew()
    org.spongepowered.api.data.MemoryDataContainer(DataView.SafetyMode)
    Use DataContainer.createNew(org.spongepowered.api.data.DataView.SafetyMode)
    org.spongepowered.api.world.SerializationBehaviors()
    Will be made private in API 8
